title: Hdp Group

images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Hdp Group. The average
  contract duration was 1.05 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $152.2K. The longest
  contract was 3.81 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.5M.
lookup_name: 'HDP GROUP'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '41'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '9'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '22%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '169%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.56'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.9M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.05'
s421_mean_contract_value: '152.2K'
s425_max_duration: '3.81'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.5M'
---
